Plot: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.
Title: The Lost Boys
Writer: Jan Fischer (story), James Jeremias (story), Jan Fischer (screenplay), James Jeremias (screenplay), Jeffrey Boam (screenplay)
Actors: Jason Patric, Corey Haim, Dianne Wiest, Barnard Hughes
tomatoConsensus: Flawed but eminently watchable, Joel Schumacher's teen vampire thriller blends horror, humor, and plenty of visual style with standout performances from a cast full of young 1980s stars.
